get.summary: Lists all relayers with pagination support.
Retrieves details of a specific relayer by ID.

patch.summary: Updates a relayer's information based on the provided update request.

get.summary: Retrieves the balance of a specific relayer.

post.summary: Performs a JSON-RPC call using the specified relayer.

requestBody.description: JSON-RPC request with method and parameters

post.summary: Signs data using the specified relayer.
Signs typed data using the specified relayer.

get.summary: Fetches the current status of a specific relayer.

post.summary: Sends a transaction through the specified relayer.

get.summary: Lists all transactions for a specific relayer with pagination.
Retrieves a transaction by its nonce value.

delete.summary: Deletes all pending transactions for a specific relayer.

get.summary: Retrieves a specific transaction by its ID.

delete.summary: Cancels a specific transaction by its ID.

get.summary: Triggers an update of system metrics and returns the result in plain text format.
get.description:
# Returns

An `HttpResponse` containing the updated metrics in plain text, or an error message if the
update fails.

200.description: Complete metrics in Prometheus exposition format

get.summary: Returns a list of all available metric names in JSON format.
get.description:
# Returns

An `HttpResponse` containing a JSON array of metric names.

get.summary: Returns the details of a specific metric in plain text format.
get.description:
# Parameters

- `path`: The name of the metric to retrieve details for.

# Returns

An `HttpResponse` containing the metric details in plain text, or a 404 error if the metric is
not found.

parameters.name: metric_name
parameters.description: Name of the metric to retrieve, e.g. utopia_transactions_total

200.description: Metric details in Prometheus text format

401.description: Unauthorized - missing or invalid API key

403.description: Forbidden - insufficient permissions to access this metric

429.description: Too many requests - rate limit for metrics access exceeded
